description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'BirthdaysPage' that displays a list of birthdays using Provider for state management. It includes a placeholder empty state when there are no birthdays and defines a private widget '_EmptyState' for the empty UI. The file references models and providers from common modules and uses Flutter's Material design components.

classes.name: BirthdaysPage
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of birthdays or an empty state if none exist.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: A private widget that shows a message and icon when there are no birthdays.

methods.name: build (BirthdaysPage)
methods.description: Builds the UI for the birthdays list or empty state based on the list content.

methods.name: build (_EmptyState)
methods.description: Builds the UI for the empty state with icon, title, and subtitle.
